TitleEnglish: Kamiina Botan, the Drunken Appearance Is a Lily Flower
SummaryEnglish: The story centers on Botan Kamiina, a 20-year-old in her first year in college, who becomes a little bolder and says surprising things when she gets drunk.
Aliases: Kamiina Botan, Yoheru Sugata wa Yuri no Hana
Kamiina Botan, Yoeru Sugata wa Yuri no Hana
Kamiina Botan, the Drunken Form Is a Lily Flower
Botan Kamiina, Her Drunken Appearance Is Like a Lily Flower
